reviews.review_msg: Good lecture notes and HWs are easy but exam is extremely hard, it's very different with HWs you did. If you want to study financial risk, take this course, otherwise, never take it, your GPA will go down

He is a tough lecturer even  he is patient to answer students' questions. Notes are great, but he barely uses the textbook. Sometimes his lecture can be very confusing.Exams are extremely hard as well as the HWs. If u really want to get into ACMA, plz avoid his courses.

His notes are very structured and have important information in them. Text was complicated and not very useful. The assignments he gives are pretty difficult. The exams are extremely hard, but that is to be expected of people going into this profession. He repeats some questions as a "gift" for people who go back and review previous questions.
Insley is a great prof. He really cares about his students. I like his note setup as well (he sends it out and you only have to fill in the blanks). Hard class but very helpful.
Great teacher. Very caring to student's success.
